statements: DELETE FROM WaterUsageData WHERE meter_id = 100 AND location_id = 1
DELETE FROM WaterUsageData WHERE reading_date < '2022-01-01' AND water_usage > 100
DELETE FROM water_efficiency_analysis WHERE analysis_id = 100 AND efficiency_rating < 0.7;
DELETE FROM smart_water_meters WHERE reading_date < '2022-01-01' AND water_usage > 100;
DELETE FROM MeterData WHERE meter_id = 101 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM WaterMeters WHERE location = 'City Center' AND customer_id = 201;
DELETE FROM MeterErrors WHERE error_type = 'Leak' AND error_description LIKE '%major%';
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Low Battery';
